thread.title: EU leaders prepare for battle over post-Brexit budget

title: EU leaders prepare for battle over post-Brexit budget
text:
EU leaders prepare for battle over post-Brexit budget Friday, February 23, 2018 - 01:54 
European Union leaders staked out opposing positions on the size and aims of the bloc's budget on Friday ahead of tough negotiations to deal with a hole in Brussels' finances created by Britain's planned departure next year. David Pollard reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
European Union leaders staked out opposing positions on the size and aims of the bloc's budget on Friday ahead of tough negotiations to deal with a hole in Brussels' finances created by Britain's planned departure next year.
